casebody.data:
In the Matter of Judith Habas, Respondent, v Lionel Habas, Appellant. Decided April 28, 1977

Reported below, 56 AD2d 747.

Appeal dismissed, without costs, by the Court of Appeals sua sponte, upon the grounds that appellant is not aggrieved by the modification at the Appellate Division (CPLR 5601, subd [a], par [iii]) and no substantial constitutional question is directly involved (CPLR 5601, subd [b], par 1).
